No offers for Krzysztof PiÄ…tek

Contrary to reports, Hertha Berlin have not received an offer from Fiorentina for the transfer of 25-year-old striker Krzysztof PiÄ…tek, according to Kicker.

The Poland international joined the Bundesliga club from AC Milan in January for €24 million on a five-year contract until 2025. Per reports in Italy, Fiorentina had submitted an offer around €25m for PiÄ…tek which appear to be false.

Hertha are absolutely planning to start the season with PiÄ…tek.

No offers for Krzysztof PiÄ…tek

Contrary to reports, Hertha Berlin have not received an offer from Fiorentina for the transfer of 25-year-old striker Krzysztof PiÄ…tek, according to Kicker.

The Poland international joined the Bundesliga club from AC Milan in January for €24 million on a five-year contract until 2025. Per reports in Italy, Fiorentina had submitted an offer around €25m for PiÄ…tek which appear to be false.

Hertha are absolutely planning to start the season with PiÄ…tek.

An intermediary is at work trying to get Inter central defender Milan Skriniar to Paris Saint-Germain according to a report from Italian broadcaster Sky Sport Italia’s transfer market expert Gianluca Di Marzio, which was aired a short time ago.

The Slovakian national team player would be the replacement for the recently departed Thiago Silva, who joined Chelsea but as things currently stand Paris Saint-Germain have made no offers to Inter for the former Sampdoria player.

The report explains that Inter would like to sign Chelsea midfielder N’Golo Kante in the transfer window to bolster their squad but before being able to do so they must boost their coffers by selling some players with Skriniar among the names who could be sold to raise all important transfer funds.
